mapper.select: select compname,status, reqdate, no from (select s.compname, c.status, c.reqdate, c.no, row_number() over(order by c.reqdate desc) as rnum from consulting c, startup s where s.id = c.compid) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY reqdate DESC
mapper.delete: delete from consulting q where no=#{no}
